channel.title: Blank 317 Client w/Cache
channel.description:
This is different to most 317 clients, they usually load a higher cache number. I down-graded all the side icons from 400 to 300. Along with the skill icons. Also added my favorite crowns. I removed the crappy model loaders and cleared up lots of code. It now loads very fast, most of the code is clean. Current IP is localhost so search for, 0.0.0.0, 127.0.0.1 or local host, and change to your IP. Thanks and hope you enjoy!
Animated water + fire cape. Might release source if requested.
It should also have God Wars.. but I removed the cache files when editing the cache, I will add them in the next version.
OR download them from here: http://www.mediafire.com/?zmutmymtonf and add them to your cache file.
Thanks!
Size: 11mb Download: http://uppit.com/bj05fcrqau9n/ScapeRune.rar Picture: [img]http://img138.imageshack.us/img138/5425/clientr.png[/img]
Credits:
Well this is tricky.. I have had this for a LONG time and I don't really remember where it came from. But credits to the original creator. I did work a lot on this client so I also deserve some.
Next Version:
Here are some sneak-peaks of things I have planned for the next version.
One login button: [img]http://img266.imageshack.us/img266/7098/loginoo.png[/img]
Bugs:
This isn't really a bug, when I was editing the icons I removed the God Wars Dungeon files from the cache. So If you get this error, don't worry: [img]http://img405.imageshack.us/img405/8352/consoleo.png[/img]
I will add the files with the new client.
OR download them from here: http://www.mediafire.com/?zmutmymtonf and add them to your cache file.

item.title: Blank 317 Client w/Cache
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:

[quote=“CatsGoMeow, post:17, topic:353253”][quote author=jmood128 link=topic=449567.msg3298478#msg3298478 date=1281115149]
Just use one of the clients MITB released, he has the cleanest clients.

http://www.moparisthebest.com/rs/bin/
[/quote]

What does that have to do with my download?[/quote]

I was just saying if you whetted a clean client, just download one of MITB’s. I doubt this is a full 317 client since I don’t think you have a 317 cache, almost all 317 clients released use the 377 cache.

item.title: Blank 317 Client w/Cache
item.dc:creator: @Nexus1 Nexus_
item.description:
@Nexus1 wrote:

[quote=“runescaperemakes, post:14, topic:353253”][quote author=CatsGoMeow link=topic=449567.msg3298320#msg3298320 date=1281102203]
Just download a server from the Server Downloads section. then extract it. Open the file called ‘run’. Your server will be online.

Then open the client and log in.
[/quote]
yh but dude isnt there any codes i need 2 change 2 my own? to get it to work for me… or it might say server alrdy in use…[/quote]
You mean how to leech it? LMFAO, I can’t wait to see someone to put this as their sig.

But, to help you out,
Install eclipse - eclipse.org (so you can learn how to code like a pro from the beggining) and open the files with it. File search the server name, edit it to your own, and presto, there you go, a leech. Now, if I were you, I would first learn some java and THEN get the source, so you dont actually leech it, release some of your work, and get some reputation on RSPS communities. (By reputation I dont mean the rep++, I mean it being as an alternative to famous, notorious, etc).

Read full topic

item.description:
@CatsGoMeow wrote:

I didn’t really understand what you said… But if you are asking how to run the server:

First find a source compatible with the client, then open the run file in the source.
Then open the client, type a username and password then click login.
